feed.title: Disability Community Resource Fair
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Cumberland/Perry MH/IDD
entry.content: Our county office supports individuals in the community with mental health, autism, and intellectual developmental disabilities. We provide information about how to access services and community resources.
entry.summary: Our county office supports individuals in the community with mental health, autism, and intellectual developmental disabilities. We provide information about how to access services and community resources.

entry.title: Developmental Fitness Company LLC
entry.content: 27 year waiver provider through ODP providing IHCS/CPS with Therapeutic Fitness with Licensed, Degreed, Certified Exercise Professionals
entry.summary: 27 year waiver provider through ODP providing IHCS/CPS with Therapeutic Fitness with Licensed, Degreed, Certified Exercise Professionals
